page.title: 17POPULATION AND RECREATION
page.content:
THIS IS A PREDOMINANTLY MIDDLE CLASS, EVEN DISTRIBUTION OF AGE GROUPS. LIFE EXPECTANCY ABOUT AVERAGE.
BEING A RURAL AREA THE MAIN OUTDOOR RECREATIONS ARE, GARDENING, HORSE RIDING AND WALKING. BECAUSE IT ENCOURAGES SOCIAL GATHERINGS, THE WOMEN'S INSTITUTE IS POPULAR. THERE ARE ALSO AGRICULTURAL SHOWS. IN THE WINTER THE MAIN LEASURE PASTIME FOR MOST IS WATCHING T.V. AND VIDEO. OF COURSE SOME PEOPLE GO OUT TO ABERGAVENNY AND NEIGHBOURING VILLAGES FOR SUCH THINGS AS SWIMMING, SQUASH, YOGA, KEEP FIT AND NIGHT CLASSES WHICH ARE AVAILABLE IN A VARIETY OF SUBJECTS
